    • Constructor Detail

      • CameraCharacterizer

        public CameraCharacterizer(android.hardware.camera2.CameraManager cameraManager,
                           CameraCharacterizer.CameraType cameraType)
                    throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructs a new CameraCharacterizer object that helps with getting the characteristics for the camera
        Parameters:
        cameraManager - the system's CameraManager
        cameraType - the desired type of camera - front facing camera or back camera
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - thrown if the provided cameraType is an invalid type

    • Method Detail

      • getMaxResolution

        public android.util.Size getMaxResolution(CameraCharacterizer.Format imageFormat)
        Gets the maximum resolution for the specified image format
        Parameters:
        imageFormat - the ImageFormat constant that the resolution will be used for
        Returns:
        a Size containing the width and height of the maximum resolution supported by the camera for the specified ImageFormat

      • getMinFitResolution

        public android.util.Size getMinFitResolution(android.util.Size resConstraint)
        Gets the minimum resolution that will fit within a resolution contraint
        Parameters:
        resConstraint - the minimum required resolution to fit
        Returns:
        the minimum resolution that is greater than resContraint and fits within the same aspect ratio

      • getResolutionSizes

        public android.util.Size[] getResolutionSizes(CameraCharacterizer.Format imageFormat)
        Gets a list of resolutions supported for the specified imageFormat
        Parameters:
        imageFormat - the imageFormat to get resolutions for
        Returns:
        an array of Size[] that contains the resolutions supported

      • getCameraId

        public java.lang.String getCameraId()
        Gets the Id of the camera for the camera device that the CameraCharacterizer uses
        Returns:
        a String containing the camera Id for the camera device type specified in the CameraCharacterizer constructor
